message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its value to us, I'm proposing an initial price of $15,000 for it.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to make a more reasonable deal. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective, and I'm willing to negotiate further. Considering the value you place on the product, I propose a price of $12,500 for it.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11,250 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose a price of $11,500 for the product.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to offer $10,750 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Considering the value you see in the product and your previous offers, I'm willing to accept $11,000 as the final price for the product.
I'm getting close to my budget, and I really want to make a deal. I'm willing to offer $10,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Given your interest in the product and your recent offer, I am willing to accept $10,750 as the final price for the product.
I'm really close to my budget, and I'm willing to make one last offer. I'm willing to offer $10,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
